TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ActionBlock`1<TInput> extends System.Object implements class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock, class System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.ITargetBlock`1<!TInput>

generic <typename TInput> public ref class ActionBlock sealed : System::Threading::Tasks::Dataflow::ITargetBlock<TInput>

typeparam.span: 此 操作的数据类型。

summary.span: 提供数据流块，其调用为每个接收的数据提供的 委托。

span.span: Provides a dataflow block that invokes a provided delegate for every data element received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来使用数据流块执行几个计算, 并返回执行计算所需的运行时间。The following example shows the use of the class to perform several computations using dataflow blocks, and returns the elapsed time required to perform the computations. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例, 提供[了如何:指定数据流块](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题中的并行度。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete() cil managed
abstract member Complete : unit -> unit override this.Complete : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知数据流块，告知其不应再接受或生成更多消息也不应再使用更多的延迟消息。

span.span: Signals to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages and shouldn't consume any more postponed messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后, 该块将完成 (以便其任务在处理完以前可用的所有数据后进入最终状态)。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete (so that its task will enter a final state) after it has processed all previously available data. 此方法不会阻止等待完成, 但会启动请求。This method will not block waiting for completion to occur, but will initiate the request. 若要等待完成, 请使用属性。To wait for completion to occur, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来向数据流块发出信号, 以便它不应接受或生成更多的消息, 也不会消耗更多的延迟消息。The following example shows the use of the method to signal to the dataflow block that it shouldn't accept or produce any more messages nor consume any more postponed messages . 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例, 提供[了如何:指定数据流块](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题中的并行度。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Completion As Task
public: property System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ Completion { System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象表示数据流块的异步操作和完成。

span.span: Gets a object that represents the asynchronous operation and completion of the dataflow block.
The completed task.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据流块在当前未处理消息时, 将被视为已完成, 并保证其不会再处理其他消息。A dataflow block is considered completed when it is not currently processing a message and when it has guaranteed that it will not process any more messages. 完成关联的块后, 返回的将转换为已完成状态。The returned will transition to a completed state when the associated block has completed. 当块根据数据流块的定义语义成功完成其处理时, 它将转换为状态。It will transition to the state when the block completes its processing successfully according to the dataflow block's defined semantics. 当数据流块由于未经处理的异常而提前完成处理时, 它将转换为状态, 并且当数据流块完成后提前处理时, 它将转换为状态正在接收取消请求。It will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely due to an unhandled exception, and it will transition to the state when the dataflow block has completed processing prematurely after receiving a cancellation request. 如果任务在状态中完成, 则其`Exception`属性将返回一个异常, 该异常包含导致块失败的一个或多个异常。If the task completes in the state, its `Exception` property returns an exception that contains one or more exceptions that caused the block to fail. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性等待所有消息通过网络传播。The following example shows how to use the property to wait for all messages to propagate through the network. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例, 提供[了如何:指定数据流块](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题中的并行度。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. [!code-csharp[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/cs/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TPLDataflow_DegreeOfParallelism#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpldataflow_degreeofparallelism/vb/dataflowdegreeofparallelism.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取等待被此代码块处理的输入项的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

value.span: 等待被此代码块处理的输入项的数目。

span.span: The number of input items waiting to be processed by this block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不包括当前正在由块处理的任何项或已被该块处理的任何项。The does not include any items that are currently being processed by the block or any items that have already been processed by the block.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法将项发布到目标数据流块。The following example shows how to use the method to post an item to the target dataflow block. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例, 提供[了如何:指定数据流块](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md)主题中的并行度。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the [How to: Specify the Degree of Parallelism in a Dataflow Block](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-specify-the-degree-of-parallelism-in-a-dataflow-block.md) topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.IDataflowBlock.Fault(class System.Exception exception) cil managed

span.span: The exception that caused the faulting.

summary.span: 导致数据流块在出错的状态下完成。

span.span: Causes the dataflow block to complete in a faulted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据流块上调用之后, 该块将完成, 并且其任务将进入最终状态。After has been called on a dataflow block, that block will complete and its task will enter a final state. 如果对块进行错误处理, 就像取消块一样, 导致缓冲消息 (未处理的输入消息以及 unoffered 的输出消息) 丢失。Faulting a block, as with canceling a block, causes buffered messages (unprocessed input messages as well as unoffered output messages) to be lost.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 提供信息至数据流块，并提供使用或延迟信息的机会。

span.span: Offers a message to the dataflow block, and gives it the opportunity to consume or postpone the message.
The status of the offered message.

returns.span: 如果消息为该目标接受，则将返回 ，将返回，并且源不应再使用提供的消息，因为其现在归目标所有。

span.span: If the message was accepted by the target, is returned, and the source should no longer use the offered message, because it is now owned by the target.

returns.span: 如果消息因该目标延迟，则将以通知的形式返回 ，该通知是目标稍后可能会尝试使用或保留消息的通知；同时，源仍拥有消息并将其提供给其他块。

span.span: If the message was postponed by the target, is returned as a notification that the target may later attempt to consume or reserve the message; in the meantime, the source still owns the message and may offer it to other blocks.

returns.span: 如果目标推迟了消息，而源为 ，则返回 。

span.span: If the target would have otherwise postponed message, but source was , is returned.

returns.span: 如果尝试了接受此则消息但由于将消息交付给另一目标或放弃该消息的源而错过该消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target tried to accept the message but missed it due to the source delivering the message to another target or simply discarding it, is returned.

returns.span: 如果目标选择不接受消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message, is returned.

returns.span: 如果源选择不接受该消息并将从不从此源接受另一则消息，则将返回 。

span.span: If the target chose not to accept the message and will never accept another message from this source, is returned.
